title: Finding the Largest Perfect Square
text: You must first identify the largest perfect square factor of the numbers inside the radicals.
speech: You must first identify the largest perfect square factor of the numbers inside the radicals.
pacedSpeech: You must first identify the largest perfect square factor of the numbers inside the radicals.

title: Finding the Largest Perfect Square
text: What is the largest perfect square factor of the number inside the radical in the numerator?
speech: What is the largest perfect square factor of the number inside the radical in the numerator?
pacedSpeech: What is the largest perfect square factor of the number inside the radical in the numerator?

title: Finding the Largest Perfect Square
text: What is the largest perfect square factor of the number inside the radical in the denominator?
speech: What is the largest perfect square factor of the number inside the radical in the denominator?
pacedSpeech: What is the largest perfect square factor of the number inside the radical in the denominator?

title: Rewriting the Radical
text: You must now rewrite the radical as the quotient of two radicals. Both of these radicals must include the perfect squares.
speech: You must now rewrite the radical as the quotient of two radicals. Both of these radicals must include the perfect squares.
pacedSpeech: You must now rewrite the radical as the quotient of two radicals. Both of these radicals must include the perfect squares.

title: Simplfying the Radicals
text: What is the result after simplifying both square roots?
speech: What is the result after simplifying both square roots?
pacedSpeech: What is the result after simplifying both square roots?
